name: Ubuntu 22.04 Dev Container
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends net-tools htop vim git curl && if [ -f '"${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/authorized_keys"' ]; then mkdir -p /home/vscode/.ssh && cp '"${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.devcontainer/authorized_keys"' /home/vscode/.ssh/authorized_keys && chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.ssh && chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh && chmod 600 /home/vscode/.ssh/authorized_keys; fi"
